Changelog
=========

1.2.1 (2010-05-21)
------------------

- Add blackbird.js after jquery.js so that it is higher than other js files.
  [jcbrand]

1.2 (2010-01-28)
----------------

- Don't register own skin-path. [jcbrand]

1.1 (2010-01-27)
----------------

- Use the @@kss_devel_mode class instead of JSRegistry.getDebugMode as the
  latter is protected. [jcbrand]

1.0 (2010-01-27)
----------------

- Initial release [jcbrand]
